project.title: Der Bürgerturm ("Citizen's Tower")
project.description: The "Bürgerturm" was the vision of a building by the people for the people in real an virtual space, based upon and rooted in the principles of Free Software. The FSF Europe was involved in the first steps of the project and although the vision didn't come true, it might still be of interest and something that someone might pick up again in the future.
